abstract: Ukrainian officials say major Russian airlines, including Aeroflot, Russian national airline, will be prohibited from flying to Ukrainian airports beginning in late October, part of trade sanctions country is imposing in response to Russian support for separatists; ban includes any Russian cargo airlines flying over Ukrainian territory if they are carrying military troops or hardware.
lead_paragraph: The ban, which would take effect next month, is part of a set of trade sanctions imposed on Russia for supporting a separatist revolt inside Ukraine.

headline.main: Ukraine to Ban Flights by Major Russian Airlines
headline.print_headline: Ukraine Bans Major Airlines From Russia

snippet: The ban, which would take effect next month, is part of a set of trade sanctions imposed on Russia for supporting a separatist revolt inside Ukraine.
